ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 64 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 128 ops/tile/clock = 16,384 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 64 cores x 2 AMX tiles x 256 ops/tile/clock = 32,768 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at all_core_boost_mhz (3000 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Sapphire Rapids flagship (4th Gen Xeon). 64 cores with HyperThreading (128 threads). Intel 7 process. Highest AMX performance in Sapphire Rapids lineup. 8-channel DDR5-4800. PCIe 5.0 with 80 lanes.
